        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	// When the service channel's "workitem_table" field changes, update its DB view accordingly
	
	var viewGr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_view');
	if (!viewGr.get('name', 'u_awa_' + current.getUniqueValue() + '_work_item')) {
		logError('sys_db_view record does not exist for service channel ' + current.getUniqueValue());
		showSessionError();
		return;
	}
	
	var sysId = viewGr.getUniqueValue();
	
	var viewTableGr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_view_table');
	viewTableGr.addQuery('view', sysId);
	viewTableGr.addQuery('variable_prefix', 'doc');
	viewTableGr.query();
	if (!viewTableGr.next()) {
		logError('sys_db_view_table record does not exist for service channel ' + current.getUniqueValue());
		showSessionError();
		return;
	}
	
	viewTableGr.table = current.workitem_table;
	if (!viewTableGr.update()) {
		logError('Unable to update view table ' + viewTableGr.getUniqueValue());
		showSessionError();
	}
})(current, previous);

function logError(err) {
	new AWALoggingUtils().atError().log('AWA Service Channel Database View update failed: {0}', err);
}

function showSessionError() {
	gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Unable to update the Database View record for this Service Channel, which is required for routing AWA Work Items.'));
}
]]></script>
